# Examples & Recipes

This vignette contains small, copy-pasteable snippets for common tasks.

## Print active paths

```r
c(
  wd            = get_microbs_wdirectory(),
  connector     = get_microbs_connector_dir(),
  raw_qpcr      = get_microbs_qPCR_rawDataPath(),
  raw_ddpcr     = get_microbs_ddPCR_rawDataPath(),
  flux          = get_microbs_flux_DataPath(),
  stdcurve      = get_microbs_stdCurve_DataPath(),
  loaded        = get_microbs_loaded_DataPath(),
  check         = get_microbs_check_DataPath(),
  calc          = get_microbs_calc_DataPath(),
  created       = get_microbs_created_DataPath(),
  dashboard     = get_microbs_dashboard_DataPath()
)
```

## Import new ddPCR files only

```r
set_microbs_ddPCR_rawDataPath("0_raw_data_ddPCR")
set_microbs_loaded_DataPath("1_loaded_data", build_path = TRUE)

ddPCR_old <- load_microbs_old_raw_ddPCR_Data()
ddPCR_new <- load_microbs_raw_ddPCR_Data()

# Archive raw after success:
# archive_microbs_raw_ddPCR_Data()
```

## Re-run calculations for qPCR

```r
set_microbs_calc_DataPath("2_calc_data")

old_q <- load_microbs_old_calc_qPCR_Data()
new_q <- calculations_microbs_qPCR()

# Archive old calc after success:
# archive_microbs_calc_qPCR_Data()
```

## Create dashboard exports only

```r
dashboard_microbs_flu_export()
dashboard_microbs_hRSV_export()
dashboard_microbs_SARS_CoV_export()
```
